MPRACE library Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
mprace::ABBImplements the library interface for the ABB Test Board
mprace::BoardAbstract interface to any board supported by the library
mprace::BridgeAbstract class to group functions present in a bridge chip
mprace::DMABufferInterface for handling DMA buffers
mprace::DMADescriptorWG::descriptorInternal structure representing the actual descriptor the engine expects to see in memory
mprace::DMAEngineAbstract interface for handling DMA operations
mprace::DMAEngineWGDMA Engine interface for the Wengxue Gao's (WG) DMA controller
mprace::DriverAbstract interface to any driver supported by the library
mprace::ExceptionRepresents any possible error inside the library
mprace::InterruptGeneratorClass controller the functionality of the Interrupt Generator Test module
mprace::LoggerImplements Logging functions for the boards
mprace::MPRACE1Implements the library interface for the MPRACE-1
mprace::MPRACE2Implements the library interface for the MPRACE-2
mprace::PCIDriverInterface between the mprace library and the new PCIDriver
mprace::PinAbstract interface to access a virtual pin
mprace::PinInRegisterIn this implementation, a pin is a bit in an existing register
mprace::PROGRAPE4Implements the library interface for the PROGRAPE4
mprace::RegisterAbstract interface to access a virtual register
mprace::RegisterAsPinIn this implementation, a single address (a register) acts as a single pin
mprace::RegisterAsPinTristateIn this implementation, 3 addresses (registers) are used for a single pin
mprace::RegisterTristateIn this implementation, 3 addresses are used for a single register
